content:
@Bryn Rhodes -- are STU4 ballot comments to be made only in the spreadsheet, or should we be using GForge?

Also, I noticed in the spreadsheet that column J - Page or Section URL is hidden, but now that CQL is published as HTML, it seems this would be a helpful column (and easier to populate than columns C - Chapter and D - Section).

Hi @Chris Moesel , CQL is not tracked in the FHIR tracker, so the comments need to come in the spreadsheet form only. That's a great point that the spreadsheet column J is hidden, we should suggest that for future ballots of web-based standards, that column be used. I don't think there would be any harm in populating it though. @Lloyd McKenzie ?
For FHIR ballots, it's not hidden. My guess is that because CQL isn't a FHIR ballot, Lynn used a different configuration. Feel free to let her know you'd like something different next time around.
